parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of button names assigned to the given user action. You can find the action names in config class ControllerSchemes or [[:Category:Key Actions|user action names]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''actionKeysNames''' userAction </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''actionKeysNames''' [userAction, maxKeys] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [userAction, maxKeys]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> UserAction: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> maxKeys: [[Number]] - Maximum number of keys to return </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value> '''actionKeysNames''' [userAction, maxKeys, inputDevicePriority] &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ''(Since Arma 3 v1.35.127928)''</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p31</name>=<value> [userAction, maxKeys, inputDevicePriority]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER31</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p32</name>=<value> UserAction: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER32</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p33</name>=<value> maxKeys: [[Number]] - Maximum number of keys to return </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER33</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p34</name>=<value> inputDevicePriority: [[String]] - Result sorted by inputDevicePriority with values:
* <tt>"Mouse"</tt>
* <tt>"Keyboard"</tt>
* <tt>"Stick"</tt>
* <tt>"Gamepad"</tt>
* <tt>"Tracker"</tt>
* <tt>"Combo"</tt> (mouse and keyboard combinations)
* <tt>"Controler"<template><title>sic</title></template></tt> (any controller other than mouse or keyboard)
Other values are considered as: 
* <tt>"Unsorted"</tt> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER34</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_list = [[actionKeysNames]] "ReloadMagazine"; //"R"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[actionKeys]], [[actionKeysImages]], [[actionKeysNamesArray]], [[actionName]], [[inputAction]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 20:14, 20 January 2010 (CET) 
<dt class="note">[[User:WGL.Q|kju]]
<dd class="note">The return type is a stacked string. A string inside a string. To compare use first single and inside double quotes:<br>
if ((actionKeysNames "User1") == '"W"') then ...

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
